headline: How Banks Can Appease Trump on Credit-Card Rates
summary: President Trump reiterated his desire for a credit-card interest rate cap this week.  Major card lenders  American Express Capital One Financial Citigroup JPMorgan Chase  and  Synchrony Financial  are all down this year.  Goldman Sachs  which has just exited a card business, has gained more than 8% so far this year.

headline: RBC Capital Expects Seasonal Loan Growth, Improved Credit Quality for Synchrony Financial (SYF) Heading into 2026
summary: Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) is one of the best large cap value stocks to buy in 2026. On January 12, RBC Capital analyst Jon Arfstrom raised the firm’s price target on Synchrony to $91 from $76 and kept a Sector Perform rating. In a broad Q4 2025 preview of the consumer finance sector, RBC Capital highlighted […]
